word_mean: 〔Michael Faraday〕法拉：电容的国际制(SI)单位。电容器容量，1库仑电荷可发出1伏特电位差。符号F。该电容单位很大，所以将它的百万分之一用作实用单位，称为微法〔拉〕(microfarad)

sentence.Network_cn: 皮可法拉,微微法拉万亿分之一法拉 ( 10 - 12 )

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: shortening of faraday. The term was originally proposed as a unit of electrical charge

means.word_mean: 1. the capacitance of a capacitor that has an equal and opposite charge of 1 coulomb on each plate and a voltage difference of 1 volt between the plates

auth_sentence.content: He gave his name to the 'farad', originally describing a unit of electrical charge but later a unit of electrical capacitance.
